title: Micro-Credential-Based Practical Language Competency Enhancement Program

context.additional_context: Practice-Centered Design for Enhancing Job Application Skills of Current Practitioners, Strengthening Self-Directed Learning Capabilities Through Portfolios and Case Studies

learning_goals: Learners can develop five or more practical conversation scenarios using job-related language expressions
Learners can apply language proficiency to three or more work situations through project deliverables in their portfolio
Learners can improve language usage errors by 80% or more through feedback exchange with peers and experts
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
